# Default Theme

:::danger CAUTION
First of all you need to install `ra-theme-context`.
Fallow instructions here on **[how to install and how to use](/docs/getting-gtarted/setup-ra-theme-provider#installation)** `ra-theme-context`.
:::

import BaseThemePopsTable from '@site/src/components/BaseThemePopsTable';
import BaseThemeColors from '@site/src/components/BaseThemeColors';

### BaseTheme

**[BaseTheme](/docs/getting-gtarted/setup-ra-theme-provider#basetheme)** object is where you define your application's color palette. Fallow the section on **[how to add color palette](/docs/theme/ra-theme-customizing-theme)**.

By default there are two color palette `light` or `dark` from `ra-theme-context`.
You also can extend `BaseTheme` object to add custom/extra colors.
Fallow the section on **[how to use one of default palettes](/docs/getting-gtarted/setup-ra-theme-provider#installation)** or **[how to extend of default palettes](/docs/theme/ra-theme-extend-theme#extend-default-theme)**).
